_meanings:
{@--3@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A
figure of speech in which a 
reference is made to the merits
or demerits of one thing by 
comparing or contrasting the merits or
demerits of another;  
{#anyadIyaguRadozaprayuktamanyasya guRadozayorADAnamullAsaH#} <ls>R. G.</ls>;
for examples, see <ls>R. G.</ls> {%ad loc.%}; <ab>cf.</ab>
<ls>Chandr. 5. 131-133</ls>.

{@--4@} A division of
a book, such as chapter, section &c.;
as the ten Ullāsas of the 
Kāvyaprakāśa.
